metadata.title: CVE-2021-47020 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:soundwire: stream: fix memory leak in stream config error pathWhen stream config is failed, master runtime will release allslave runtime in the slave_rt_list, but slave runtime is notadded to the list at this time. This patch frees slave runtimein the config error path to fix the memory leak.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
